name: threeflows
description: Practice spaces for teacher preparation programs

scripts.db-create-role-dev: psql -c "CREATE ROLE tm WITH PASSWORD 'teachermoments'"; psql -c "ALTER ROLE tm WITH LOGIN"
scripts.db-init-local: npm run db-create-role-dev; npm run db-create-dev; psql -c "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE teachermoments to tm"
